config.section.Map.name: Farm size reminder: WaFF> medium, WaFFLE> large
config.World_Map_Recolor.name: Use World Map recolors
config.World_Map_Recolor.description: Change the color of the farm area on the world map if you're using a recolor. May not work alongside SVE if the recolor mod itself doesn't support SVE. (Currently supported - Earthy Recolour, Vibrant Pastoral & Wittily Named Recolor)
config.World_Map_Colors_Alt.name: Use alternative colors
config.World_Map_Colors_Alt.description: When available, will use a recolor optional colors on the map. Vibrant pastoral will show red autumn grass (instead of green) & Wittily Named Recolor will show light dirt (instead of dark)
config.section.Abandoned_Shed_Ex.name: > Abandoned shed exterior
config.Abandoned_Shed_Appearance.name: Shed appearance
config.Abandoned_Shed_Appearance.descrip: Either let the game decide or manually select the appearance of the shed to fit different textures packs.
config.Use_Shed_WaFF.name: (WaFF) Activate the Shed
config.Use_Shed_WaFF.description: Make the abandoned shed available and upgradable when playing on WaFF. Entering it as well as the available floors will depend on your farm advancement.
config.Unlock_Shed_WaFF.name: (WaFF) Complete unlock
config.Unlock_Shed_WaFF.description: Unlock and fully upgrade the abandoned shed on WaFF, no matter the advancement of your farmhouse (casks still need the cellar in order to work). Useful if any issue prevents the upgrades from unlocking the normal way.
config.Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFF.name: (WaFF) Shed location
config.Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFF.desc: Set the abandoned shed location on WaFF.
config.Use_Shed_WaFFLE.name: (WaFFLE) Activate the Shed
config.Use_Shed_WaFFLE.description: Make the abandoned shed available and upgradable when playing on WaFFLE. Entering it as well as the available floors will depend on your farm advancement.
config.Unlock_Shed_WaFFLE.name: (WaFFLE) Complete unlock
config.Unlock_Shed_WaFFLE.description: Unlock and fully upgrade the abandoned shed on WaFFLE, no matter the advancement of your farmhouse (casks still need the cellar in order to work). Useful if any issue prevents the upgrades from unlocking the normal way.
config.Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFFLE.de: Set the abandoned shed location on WaFFLE.
config.Shed_Planks.name: Floor Planks
config.Shed_Planks.description: Add planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars.
config.Shed_Planks_Type.name: Planks material & color
config.Shed_Planks_Type.description: Select the color of the floor planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars, or change them to stone.
config.Shed_Planks_Textures.name: Planks design
config.Shed_Planks_Textures.description: Select the texture of the floor planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars.
config.Shed_Pillars_WaFF.name: (WaFF) Add support pillars
config.Shed_Pillars_WaFF.description: Decorate the shed's main room with support pillars. Only apply when playing on WaFF.
config.Shed_Pillars_WaFFLE.name: (WaFFLE) Add support pillars
config.Shed_Pillars_WaFFLE.description: Decorate the shed's main room with support pillars. Only apply when playing on WaFFLE.
config.Cellar_Allows_Casks_in_Shed_F0.de: Once available, extend the usage of casks to the entry floor of the abandoned shed instead of limiting it to the shed basement.
config.Roof_Greenhouse_Type_WaFF.name: (WaFF) Greenhouse layout
config.Roof_Greenhouse_Type_WaFF.descrip: When playing on WaFF, set the roof greenhouse to accommodate either 8 iridium sprinklers and 20 trees, 12 sprinklers and 4 trees, or 2 sprinklers and 40 trees.
config.Roof_Greenhouse_Type_WaFFLE.name: (WaFFLE) Greenhouse layout
config.Roof_Greenhouse_Type_WaFFLE.descr: When playing on WaFFLE, set the roof greenhouse to accommodate either 8 iridium sprinklers and 20 trees, 12 sprinklers and 4 trees, or 2 sprinklers and 40 trees.
